name: Academy Dropout
description: Learn any 1 Utility Spell.

name: Acrobat
description: Can be thrown by a larger ally REALLY far. Half damage from falling and forced movement.

name: Accidental Acrobat
description: Whenever you fail a DEX-related roll, may roll again. If still fail, consequences are BAD.
requirement: 0 or negative DEX at character creation

name: At Home Underground
description: Dig twice as fast. Safe resting underground always counts as Lavish lodging. Struggle to rest (INT save) while raining.

name: Back Out of Retirement
description: Let's see if I remember how to do this: May gain 1 Wound to use ability or cast spell as if 1 level higher. These old bones: Age shows. -1 max Wounds.

name: Bumblewise
description: Result of 1 or less on any WIL-related roll counts as natural 20 (WIL save, Naturecraft, Perception, Influence, Insight check).
requirement: 0 or negative WIL at character creation

name: Devoted Protector
description: Choose 1 ally. Survive +3 max Wounds as long as they are nearby. Whenever they take a Wound, you do too.

name: Fearless
description: Immune to Frightened condition. +1 Initiative. -1 Armor.

name: Fey Touched
description: Take half damage from all magical effects, double from weapons made of metal (before armor applied).

name: (Former) Con Artist
description: Can forge most documents or mimic voices flawlessly. Have criminal contact in most major cities. Reputation often precedes you.

name: Haunted Past
description: Haunted by voices giving cryptic advice. Sometimes VERY helpful, sometimes want to see you suffer. Advantage against fear. Ear to the Ground: Advantage on checks to know/obtain gossip for events soon or less than 1 year ago.

name: History Buff
description: Advantage on all Lore checks related to knowledge about items, facts, or events more than 100 years ago.

name: Home at Sea
description: Recover twice as many Wounds and HP resting on ship or near water. Can fill in for first mate or captain. Advantage on water-related skill checks.

name: Made a BAD Choice
description: Start with 500 or 1000 extra gold, or uncommon/rare magical item (GM allows). Gain equally powerful curse or enemy who wants it back.

name: Raised by Goblins
description: Speak Goblin natively. Automatically notice and avoid crudely-made traps; advantage noticing/disarming sophisticated traps.

name: (Secretly) Undead
description: Unnatural Resilience: Immune to disease, don't need to eat/drink/breathe. Children, animals, Celestials uneasy in your presence; horrified discovering true nature.

name: So Dumb I'm Smart Sometimes
description: Reroll INT-related skill check, 1/day. Reroll failed INT save with advantage, 1/Safe Rest.
requirement: 0 or negative INT at character creation

name: Survivalist
description: Never run out of personal rations. Anything can be food. Advantage against poison saves. +1 max Hit Die.

name: Taste for the Finer Things
description: Always have up-to-date knowledge of customs/dress of upper classes and know secrets. Advantage on Influence checks with upper class.

name: Tradesman/Artisan
description: Choose profession (Baker/Cook, Smith, Stonemason, Weaver, Leatherworker, etc.). Checks related to that profession made with advantage. Retain special knowledge.

name: What? I've Been Around
description: 1/per location. Know JUST the person who has information or can get you out of jam. Roll 1d20: 1-5 They want you DEAD; 6-12 You owe them money; 13-19 They can be convinced to help; 20 They are your biggest fan.

name: Wild One
description: Wild creatures less frightened and more willing to aid. +1 Naturecraft. While Field Resting, roll Hit Dice with advantage in the wild.

name: Wily Underdog
description: Reroll failed STR-related roll and use another stat instead, 1/day.
requirement: 0 or negative STR at character creation
